quotes: Happiness is a journey, not a destination.
Smile, it's the key that fits the lock of everybody's heart.
activities: Dance to your favorite song for 5 minutes.
Write 3 things you are grateful for.
Happy.relaxation_tip: Close your eyes and imagine a place that makes you feel safe and happy.
Happy.story: Once there was a boy who carried a sunshine in his pocket. Whenever someone was sad, he would pull it out and share the light. The boy realized that by sharing happiness, his own never diminished.

quotes: Tears are words the heart can't express.
Every storm runs out of rain eventually.
activities: Write your feelings in a journal.
Watch a comforting movie you loved as a child.
Sad.relaxation_tip: Take slow deep breaths. Inhale positivity, exhale sadness.
Sad.story: A little bird lost in a storm found shelter under a large oak tree. Though frightened, the bird realized it was stronger for having faced the wind.
affirmations: This feeling is temporary. I am healing.
I allow myself to feel and move forward.

quotes: The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
Always be on the lookout for the presence of wonder.
activities: Read an article about a random new topic.
Explore a museum or library online.
Curious.relaxation_tip: Let your curiosity wander; allow yourself to explore without judgment.
Curious.story: A cat curious about the stars climbed the tallest tree. Though it couldn’t touch the sky, it found new places no other cat had seen before.
affirmations: Curiosity leads me to new adventures.
I grow through exploring new ideas.

quotes: Speak when you are angry and you will make the best speech you will ever regret.
Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die.
activities: Go for a fast walk or run to burn the energy.
Write a letter to your anger (and tear it up).
Angry.relaxation_tip: Clench your fists, then slowly release. Let go of tension physically and mentally.
Angry.story: There once was a raging river that destroyed everything in its path. But when guided into channels, it brought water to dry lands. Anger, too, can be channeled for growth.
affirmations: I am in control of my emotions.
I breathe out anger, I breathe in calm.

quotes: Excitement is the fuel for success.
Today is full of opportunities to shine.
activities: Start a new creative project you've been putting off!
Share your excitement by calling someone you love.
Excited.relaxation_tip: Channel your excitement into positive action steps. Prioritize one small task at a time.
Excited.story: A young inventor was so excited about her ideas that she stayed up all night. By morning, she had built something the world had never seen — excitement fuels innovation.
affirmations: My excitement is a powerful creative force.
I embrace my energy and passion.
